author: jstrachan
msg: Added a JellyUnit test case to demonstrate the bug that J. Matthew Pryor recently found in the XPath feature in Jelly.

Plus I've now fixed the bug. When using the namespace context for the XPath expression, the default no-prefix namespace should not be used, as this breaks XPath and hides the default XPath function libraries.
Inside XPath, the default namespace (i.e. when no prefix is used) should always be "".

author: jstrachan
msg: minor patch to work around an XPath ordering bug in Jaxen

author: jstrachan
msg: Added a JUnit test case to demonstrate the bug spotted by J. Matthew Pryor, then added a fix for the bug.
The <x:attribute> when used inside an <x:element> was not working correctly. Now we've a JellyUnit test case to ensure this works correctly.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched bug in gridbag demo spotted by Mark Dimon

author: jstrachan
msg: Added patch supplied by Theo Niemeijer that avoids the body of an Ant tag being invoked twice by accident.
The getBodyText() invokes the tags body but was incorrectly being called twice.
